attributes.action: make MPs pay for their congestion charges and petrol expenses from their own pockets, rather than exempting or subsidising them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the government introduces more and more taxes and legislation to penalise the motorist, it can hardly be fair that Ministers and MPs are either exempted or subsidised by taxpayers for their own transport expenses. We therefore urge the government to remove all exemptions and subsidies relating to transport for MPs except for public transport, which they should be encouraged or even compelled to use exclusively - much as they are trying to do to the taxpayer.
